GSD.description:
ceph: avoid putting the realm twice when decoding snaps fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.157 by commit 044bc6d3c2c0e9090b0841e7b723875756534b45. For more details please see the references link.
